job_tasks.phrase: responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organization, within the banking sector and beyond
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the broader business strategy and the goal of differentiating the company through data.

job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the need to connect technical work with overarching business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the ability to bridge the gap between business problems and technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: help creating innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Dialogue Analytics
job_tasks.justification: Implies the development of practical, deployable solutions that are data-driven and scalable.

job_tasks.phrase: implement these solutions across the organization
job_tasks.justification: Suggests the need to integrate and deploy developed solutions into existing organizational systems.

job_tasks.phrase: work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a requirement to understand and interact with various business units and their specific needs.

soft_skills.phrase: proactively work with teams to implement these solutions
work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on business understanding, collaboration, and implementing data-driven solutions within a banking context. It lacks specific details about core AI engineering tasks such as model development, fine-tuning, or prompt engineering, and does not mention relevant AI technologies.
